mapper.update:
UPDATE `sales_raw` SET
`vin_code` = #{set.vinCode},
`sales_car_type` = #{set.salesCarType},
`sales_state` = #{set.salesState},
`dealer_code` = #{set.dealerCode},
`dealer_name` = #{set.dealerName},
`produce_date` = #{set.produceDate},
`first_pin_date` = #{set.firstPinDate},
`second_pin_date` = #{set.secondPinDate},
`factory_code` = #{set.factoryCode},
`factory_area` = #{set.factoryArea},
`eng_short_code` = #{set.engShortCode},
`eng_type` = #{set.engType},
`eng_series` = #{set.engSeries},
`sales_area` = #{set.salesArea},
`sales_year` = #{set.salesYear},
`sales_month` = #{set.salesMonth},
`tran_short_code` = #{set.tranShortCode},
`tran_type` = #{set.tranType},
`tran_series` = #{set.tranSeries},
`car_short_code` = #{set.carShortCode},
`car_model` = #{set.carModel},
`car_model_code` = #{set.carModelCode},
`sales_id` in
#{item} and
`sales_id` >= #{where.salesIdSt} and
`sales_id` <= #{where.salesIdEd} and
`vin_code` in
#{item} and
(
`Vin_code` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Vin_code` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sales_car_type` in
#{item} and
(
`Sales_car_type` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sales_car_type` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sales_state` in
#{item} and
(
`Sales_state` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sales_state` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`dealer_code` in
#{item} and
(
`Dealer_code` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Dealer_code` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`dealer_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Dealer_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Dealer_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`produce_date` in
#{item} and
(
`Produce_date` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Produce_date` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`first_pin_date` in
#{item} and
(
`First_pin_date` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`First_pin_date` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`second_pin_date` in
#{item} and
(
`Second_pin_date` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Second_pin_date` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`factory_code` in
#{item} and
(
`Factory_code` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Factory_code` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`factory_area` in
#{item} and
(
`Factory_area` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Factory_area` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`eng_short_code` in
#{item} and
(
`Eng_short_code` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Eng_short_code` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`eng_type` in
#{item} and
(
`Eng_type` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Eng_type` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`eng_series` in
#{item} and
(
`Eng_series` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Eng_series` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sales_area` in
#{item} and
(
`Sales_area` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sales_area` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sales_year` in
#{item} and
(
`Sales_year` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sales_year` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sales_month` in

) and

) and

) and

) and

) and
`car_short_code` in

) and
(
`Car_short_code` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and

(

) and
